original_title: Joey Boy Munti: 15 anyos ka sa Muntinlupa
overview: A rich girl dies in childbirth, leaving the baby with her grief-stricken husband. Her parents kidnap the infant but he abducts the little boy back. Poor and jobless, the father is now faced with the responsibility of providing for his son.
title: Joey Boy Munti: 15 anyos ka sa Muntinlupa
